str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To fast, abstain from food. From nestis; to abstain from food.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To anoint: festivally, in homage, medicinally, or in anointing the dead. To oil.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From the primary kapto; the head, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To wash; mid. I wash my own (hands, etc.). To cleanse; ceremonially, to perform ablution.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From pros and ops; the front, i.e. The countenance, aspect, appearance, surface; by implication, presence, person.
